    Methods in beans that return types with arguments of type RequestMoney
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<RequestMoney>
    RequestBean.getAllRequests()
    Retrieves all money requests (both sent and received) for the current user
    List<RequestMoney>
    RequestBean.getReceivedRequests()
    Retrieves all money requests received by the current user
    List<RequestMoney>
    RequestBean.getSentRequests()
    Retrieves all money requests sent by the current user
